original_text:
What more could have been done for my vineyard
    than I have done for it?
When I looked for good grapes,
    why did it yield only bad?
korean_text: 내가 내 포도원을 위하여 행한 것 외에 무엇을 더할 것이 있으랴 내가 좋은 포도 맺기를 기다렸거늘 들포도를 맺음은 어찌 됨인고

sentences.original_text: What more could have been done for my vineyard
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 포도원을 위해 더 무엇을 할 수 있었을까

sentences.original_text: than I have done for it?
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 그것을 위해 했던 것보다 더?

sentences.original_text: When I looked for good grapes,
why did it yield only bad?
